Installing Telepresence

You will need the following available on your machine:

  • OS X or Linux.
  • kubectl command line tool.
  • Access to your Kubernetes cluster, with local credentials on your machine. You can do this test by running kubectl get pod - if this works you’re all set.

OS X

On OS X you can install Telepresence by running the following:

brew cask install osxfuse brew install datawire/blackbird/telepresence

Ubuntu 16.04 or later

Run the following to install Telepresence:

curl -s https://packagecloud.io/install/repositories/datawireio/telepresence/script.deb.sh | sudo bash apt install --no-install-recommends telepresence

Fedora 25

Run the following:

curl -s https://packagecloud.io/install/repositories/datawireio/telepresence/script.rpm.sh | sudo bash dnf install telepresence

Other platforms

Don’t see your favorite platform? Let us know and we’ll try to add it.
